item.title: Koloa Zipline in Kauai
item.description: Get a new perspective on Kauai as you soar through lush forests and over the Waita Reservoir on the island’s longest ziplines. While cruising across the 8-track course near Koloa, hang on to the handlebars or try some more daring acrobatic stunts with the hands-free ‘Flyin' Kauai'an’ harness.

image.alt: Koloa Zipline in Kauai

item.title: Kauai Eco Adventure Helicopter Tour
item.description: To fully appreciate the beauty of Hawaii’s ‘Garden Isle,’ take to the skies above Kauai on a helicopter tour in a new Eurocopter Eco-Star. Soar over the island’s diverse terrain, from rain-soaked Mt. Waialeale and the waterfalls of Waiapuna to the dry red ravine of Waimea Canyon and the breathtaking emerald spires of the Na Pali Coast. A two-way radio to communicate with the pilot and expansive viewing glass add to the unforgettable flight.

image.alt: Kauai Eco Adventure Helicopter Tour

item.title: Kauai Deluxe Sightseeing Flight
item.description: Choose one passenger when booking to see your pricing options on this bird’s-eye view of Kauai’s spectacular scenery on a deluxe air tour! Marvel at natural wonders like the Na Pali Coast, Waimea Canyon, Hanalei Bay and tropical waterfalls. Soar over the "Garden Island" in an aircraft specially designed for sightseeing as your pilot provides narration through high-tech headsets during the flight.

image.alt: Kauai Deluxe Sightseeing Flight

item.title: Entire Kauai Airplane Tour with All Window Seats
item.description: Soar over the entire Garden Island for unforgettable views on this air tour of Kauai. From aboard an aircraft designed for sightseeing, soak up breathtaking views of natural attractions like Waimea Canyon, Opaekaa Falls, the rugged Na Pa Coast, and Mt Waialeale — the wettest spot on earth. Your experienced pilot provides informative narration during this thrilling flight.

image.alt: Entire Kauai Airplane Tour with All Window Seats

item.title: Half-Day Raft and Snorkel Adventure to Na Pali
item.description: Explore the dramatic cliffs and crystalline waters of Kauai’s Na Pali Coast on a half-day snorkeling adventure. Cruise along the spectacular coastline aboard a motorized raft, stopping to splash into the clear waters and snorkel among native marine life at one of Kauai’s best coral reefs. Traveling by raft allows the flexibility to navigate the rugged sea caves and waterfalls that dot the spectacular Na Pali shoreline. A deli lunch and beverages are included on this small-group tour.

image.alt: Half-Day Raft and Snorkel Adventure to Na Pali

item.title: Hughes 500 4-Passenger Doors-Off Helicopters
item.description: Get those drone views of Hawaii’s “Garden Isle”—but get them yourself, in an open-door helicopter. With no rear middle seats, you and your crew will take to the skies for nearly an hour, flying above lush canyons, wild cliffs, and the wettest spot on Earth. Led by a trained firefighting pilot, you’ll get a fast-paced-yet-awe-inducing adventure, and you’ll nab some of the most gorgeous views on the planet.

image.alt: Hughes 500 4-Passenger Doors-Off Helicopters

item.title: Deluxe Na Pali Morning Snorkel Tour on the Lucky Lady
item.description: The Na Pali coast is one of the most spectacular sights in Kauai. The best way to see it is from the water, so join this catamaran cruise for unbeatable views of lush green valleys, towering spires, jagged sea cliffs, and wildlife such as dolphins and sea turtles, as well as time for snorkeling and swimming. Includes a breakfast treat and pre-made lunch.

image.alt: Deluxe Na Pali Morning Snorkel Tour on the Lucky Lady

item.title: Deluxe Na Pali Sunset Tour on the Lucky Lady
item.description: The Na Pali Coast is one of the world's most spectacular coastlines. And one of the best ways to see it is with this sunset cruise. As the sun sets, glide past the jagged peaks and emerald valleys from aboard a luxury catamaran,

image.alt: Deluxe Na Pali Sunset Tour on the Lucky Lady

item.title: Kauai Adventure: Kayak & Hike to Secret Falls with Expert Guide
item.description: Explore the natural beauty of Kauai on a 5-hour tour that combines a lovely kayaking trip with an moderately easy hike to Uluwehi Falls, also known as Secret Falls. Your experienced guide provides a paddling lesson and guided kayak tour in the Wailua River Valley, following gorgeous waterways through the lush Kauai landscape. Then hop out of your kayaks and take a 45-minute hike to Secret Falls where you can cool off in the clear waters before returning to the Wailua marina the way you came.

image.alt: Kauai Adventure: Kayak & Hike to Secret Falls with Expert Guide

item.title: Private Doors-Off Kauai Helicopter: Ultimate Waterfalls & Canyons
item.description: The excitement of a helicopter tour can quickly turn to disappointment when you are seated in the middle. Not on this private tour where every seat is a window seat. You'll get excellent views of Kauai as you soar through the sky, over Manawaiopuna Falls, also known as “Jurassic Park falls," the Olokele Canyon, Waimea Canyon, Na Pali coast, North Shore and Wai'ale'ale crater.

image.alt: Private Doors-Off Kauai Helicopter: Ultimate Waterfalls & Canyons

item.title: Guided Secret Falls Tour with Snacks and Drinks
item.description: Embark on a Garden Isle adventure with a half-day kayak trip on Kauai’s legendary Wailua River. Paddle through lush tropical landscape with a guide, passing a traditional Hawaiian village and learning about the river’s ancient, sacred history along the way. Feel like an island explorer as you hike to a sparkling waterfall.

image.alt: Guided Secret Falls Tour with Snacks and Drinks

item.title: Na Pali Coast Super Raft Adventure with Snorkel
item.description: Head out on an epic adventure along one of the world's most magnificent coastlines. From your comfortable vantage point on a 37-foot (11 meter) Naiad Super Raft, enjoy spectacular views of the 17-mile-long Na Pali Coast State Wilderness Park. Explore sea caves and private beaches—accessible only by raft—and snap photos of majestic cathedrals (the cliffs that tower over Kalalau Valley). As you journey along the water, keep an eye out for the marine life that inhabits the area, including dolphins and whales. Each trip (weather permitting) includes time to take a dip and snorkel amongst tropical fish, and, if you're lucky, sea turtles.

image.alt: Na Pali Coast Super Raft Adventure with Snorkel

item.title: Na Pali Sunset & Sightsee Boat Tour
item.description: Seventeen miles of sea arches, hidden caves, and spectacular shoreline, witnessing the Na Pali coast is a must on any visit to Kauai. On this tour, you’ll get to truly sink it in, exploring the waters’ length via power catamaran, searching for dolphins and humpback whales (if its the right seaon), stopping for an al fresco dinner, and toasting to Kauai’s “Garden Isle” beauty while the sun falls behind Na Pali’s horizon.

image.alt: Na Pali Sunset & Sightsee Boat Tour

item.title: Secret Falls Kayak Hike in Kauai
item.description: If you’re looking for a grand adventure while in Kauai, book this Uluwehi Falls (Secret Falls) Kayaking and Hiking Half-Day Tour. First, follow a guide who knows the area well on the Wailua River by kayak for a 4-mile (6.4-kilometer) paddle adventure. Then, hit the shore for a hike through the rainforest-like setting all the way to Uluwehi Falls (Secret Falls) to take in the amazing views of the falls.

image.alt: Secret Falls Kayak Hike in Kauai

item.title: Kauai ATV Tour: Historic Sugar Cane Roads & Koloa Town Adventure
item.description: Learn about Hawaiian history and culture as you explore Kauai by ATV by booking this guided tour. After a safety briefing, you'll hop aboard an ATV and hit the trails, passing through plantations and up to an inactive volcano. You may even have the chance to do a bit of catch-and-release fishing at the Waita Reservoir before returning to your starting point.

image.alt: Kauai ATV Tour: Historic Sugar Cane Roads & Koloa Town Adventure

item.title: Kauai Deluxe Waterfall Safari
item.description: Get great views—and see far more than would be possible from land—by taking to the Kauai skies on this small-group helicopter tour. You'll cover the island's most important attractions as you soar over landscapes made famous by movies; the high sea cliffs of the Na Pali Coast, Waimea Canyon, waterfalls and more.

image.alt: Kauai Deluxe Waterfall Safari

item.title: Wailua River & Waterfalls Kayak Tour: Expert-Guided Adventure
item.description: Experience Kauai nature at its finest on this kayaking and waterfall hiking tour. Paddle the majestic Wailua River, original home of the first Hawaiians, as your guide shares stories about the flora and fauna of Kauai`s most sacred area. then, hike through the rainforest to Secret Falls where you can enjoy a refreshing dip before a delicious lunch.

image.alt: Wailua River & Waterfalls Kayak Tour: Expert-Guided Adventure

item.title: Kauai’s Ultimate Guided Shore Snorkel (NO BOAT): South Poipu
item.description: Avoid crowds and embark on a Kauai snorkeling tour that limits group size. Head for Kauai’s pristine southshore reefs to see tropical fish, sea urchins, and sea mammals. You may also see a Hawaiian green sea turtle nesting on the beach or a Hawaiian monk seal basking in the sun.

image.alt: Kauai’s Ultimate Guided Shore Snorkel (NO BOAT): South Poipu

item.title: Princeville Botanical Gardens Tour and Chocolate Tasting Ticket
item.description: Indulge a passion for both nature and chocolate on this tropical tasting tour of Princeville Botanical Gardens in Kauai. Explore the plants and flowers that thrive at different elevations of the island on a guided tour of the garden’s terraces, creek beds, and valley floor, stopping along the way to taste fresh Hawaiian fruit and honey. Rest your feet in a shady outdoor tasting area as you sample single-origin gourmet chocolates from around the world and learn how cocoa beans are transformed into delicious chocolate products.

image.alt: Princeville Botanical Gardens Tour and Chocolate Tasting Ticket

item.title: Wailua River Kayak and Sacred Falls Hike - With Lunch
item.description: Explore the natural beauty of Kauai with a combo hiking and kayaking adventure on the Wailua River. Enjoy a leisurely paddle down this sacred river surrounded by lush tropical scenery, and then disembark for a guided nature hike to a waterfall. Refuel with a picnic lunch, and then take a dip in the refreshing waters of the pool at the base of the falls. No kayaking experience is necessary — just bring your sense of adventure! Choose from a morning or afternoon departure to suit your schedule.

image.alt: Wailua River Kayak and Sacred Falls Hike - With Lunch

item.title: Waimea Canyon Downhill Bike Ride
item.description: The “Grand Canyon of the Pacific,” a bike ride down Waimea Canyon means views of Waipo'o Falls, the Na Pali Coast, Kekaha Beach, and stops in three state parks: Waimea Canyon, Kokee, and Na Pali Coast State Wilderness Park. On this tour, you’ll ride to both iconic and secret spots, catch sunset over the “forbidden island,” and best yet—get a van ride to the top.

image.alt: Waimea Canyon Downhill Bike Ride

item.title: Doors Off Adventure
item.description: Known for its lush rainforests, dramatic cliffs, and tumbling waterfalls, Kauai is a sightseer’s dream—and this helicopter tour provides one-of-a-kind aerial views of its scenery. Pick between morning and afternoon departure times, head to the Lihue Airport, and take to the skies: in this doorless helicopter, you’ll enjoy extraordinary perspectives on Mt. Waialeale, the Na Pali Coast, Manawaiopuna Falls, Waimea Canyon State Park, and more.

image.alt: Doors Off Adventure

item.title: Luau Ka Hikina Admission Ticket with Dinner and Lei Greeting
item.description: You cannot leave Kauai without an authentic luau experience, and to get one you need only visit us at the newest, most exciting and authentic luau on the island. Fronting the ancient royal surfing grounds. From the impressive torch lighting ceremony that kicks off the evening’s festivities to the mesmerizing hula kahiko (ancient hula) dances performed under the direction of an award-winning kumu hula (hula master) Leilani Rivera Low, Luau Ka Hikina invites you to experience a memorable evening celebrating Hawaiian and Polynesian culture, complete with a locally sourced, traditional Hawaiian feast with a modern point of view and live music.

image.alt: Luau Ka Hikina Admission Ticket with Dinner and Lei Greeting

item.title: Hanalei Bay AM Kayak and Snorkel Tour
item.description: Get up close and personal with the spectacular scenery of Hanalei Bay—and enjoy an active way to explore—on this two-in-one, half-day tour. Begin with a kayaking trip along the Hanalei River before heading onto the Bay to soak up the scenery, spy sea turtles, and more. Then, swap your kayak for a snorkel for an underwater nature expedition. Finally, unwind with lunch on the beach.

image.alt: Hanalei Bay AM Kayak and Snorkel Tour
